title: Anyway to stop Pixel 3s from crashing every time you search "what to watch"?
content:
My wife and I experience a crash on our Pixel 3 XLs every time we search "what to watch" from the Google search bar, or app.
There's no crash when searching the same in Chrome, or from any app on my old Pixel 1 XL.
Been sending feedback for weeks now with no change as of yet.
